name: where do memories go when we die?
name_original: where do memories go when we die?
description:
An interactive fiction puzzle.

Help the ghosts move forward and onwards. Find what's keeping them anchored to this plane.

original cover image photo by Mila Albrecht

NOTE ON PRICING: I want my games to be accessible for as many people as possible! If $5 is more than you can afford, please contact me directly by emailing me (vnguyen@mica.edu).
